verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%> upon <S%H7802>Shoshannimeduth<s%>, A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%>. Give <S%H238>ear<s%>, O <S%H7462>Shepherd<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, thou that <S%H5090>leadest<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> like a <S%H6629>flock<s%>; thou that <S%H3427>dwellest<s%> between the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%>, shine <S%H3313>forth<s%>. of: or, for

<S%H6440>Before<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> and <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> stir <S%H5782>up<s%> thy <S%H1369>strength<s%>, and <S%H3212>come<s%> and <S%H3444>save<s%> us. come: Heb. come for salvation to us
Turn us <S%H7725>again<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, and cause thy <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine<s%>; and we shall be <S%H3467>saved<s%>.
O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, how long wilt thou be <S%H6225>angry<s%> against the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people<s%>? be: Heb. smoke
Thou <S%H398>feedest<s%> them with the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H1832>tears<s%>; and givest them <S%H1832>tears<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%> in great <S%H7991>measure<s%>.
Thou <S%H7760>makest<s%> us a <S%H4066>strife<s%> unto our <S%H7934>neighbours<s%>: and our <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H3932>laugh<s%> among themselves.
Turn us <S%H7725>again<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, and cause thy <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine<s%>; and we shall be <S%H3467>saved<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H5265>brought<s%> a <S%H1612>vine<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: thou hast cast <S%H1644>out<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, and <S%H5193>planted<s%> it.
Thou <S%H6437>preparedst<s%> room <S%H6440>before<s%> it, and didst cause it to take <S%H8328>deep<s%> <S%H8327>root<s%>, and it <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>.

The <S%H2022>hills<s%> were <S%H3680>covered<s%> with the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of it, and the <S%H6057>boughs<s%> thereof were like the <S%H410>goodly<s%> <S%H730>cedars<s%>. goodly: Heb. cedars of God
She sent <S%H7971>out<s%> her <S%H7105>boughs<s%> unto the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and her <S%H3127>branches<s%> unto the <S%H5104>river<s%>.
Why hast thou then broken <S%H6555>down<s%> her <S%H1447>hedges<s%>, so that all they which <S%H5674>pass<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> do <S%H717>pluck<s%> her?
The <S%H2386>boar<s%> out of the <S%H3293>wood<s%> doth <S%H3765>waste<s%> it, and the wild <S%H2123>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> doth <S%H7462>devour<s%> it.
<S%H7725>Return<s%>, we beseech thee, O <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>: look <S%H5027>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H7200>behold<s%>, and <S%H6485>visit<s%> this <S%H1612>vine<s%>;
And the <S%H3657>vineyard<s%> <S%H3661><s%> which thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%> hath <S%H5193>planted<s%>, and the <S%H1121>branch<s%> that thou madest <S%H553>strong<s%> for thyself.
It is <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>, it is cut <S%H3683>down<s%>: they <S%H6>perish<s%> at the <S%H1606>rebuke<s%> of thy <S%H6440>countenance<s%>.
Let thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> be upon the <S%H376>man<s%> of thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, upon the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> whom thou madest <S%H553>strong<s%> for thyself.
So will not we go <S%H5472>back<s%> from thee: <S%H2421>quicken<s%> us, and we will <S%H7121>call<s%> upon thy <S%H8034>name<s%>.
Turn us <S%H7725>again<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, cause thy <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine<s%>; and we shall be <S%H3467>saved<s%>.
